name: Project Tron
description:
This a project from a school exercise, we have to make a Tron-like game in a group of 3 people, for this game we have done all the assets except musics. The 3d models of bike was made by Amaury Janneteau, and with my classmate samuel-barbeau we done the coding part, i particularly work on the movement of the players bike, there physics and the life manager.

For the sfx i pick them up in a bundle asset.

The game is made on unity, it's a local multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players.

The goal is to takedown your opponents with your lightcycle and to be the last player remain on the map.
